backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with authorization, storage, Stripe integration, and data types for users, listings, bookings, and related domain models.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files used as reference descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions including light/dark color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining meta tags, SEO data, and root app container for the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, QueryClient, theme provider, and mounts all application pages.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays animated real‑time availability counts for four property types with loading skeleton and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityModa: Empty or placeholder file with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three-step booking flow UI with animated icons and styling based on listing category.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Empty file with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/ExploreSection.t: Empty file with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches featured listings and displays them in a grid with loading skeletons and styled variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with authentication handling, routing buttons, and admin/user options.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Empty file with no content provided.
Shows an interactive India map with animated city markers indicating active and upcoming locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, routed content, and optional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Displays a property card with category icons, rating, availability, and styled variants linking to details.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: 3D-styled listing card showing image, category icon, availability, rating, and navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty placeholder file for a listing detail modal component.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Map section displaying animated markers, floating badges, and property info using event marker data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Profile setup dialog allowing users to submit name, email, phone, and owner status, then saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Badge component mapping property status to label, icon, and styling.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Review display and submission UI with rating, comment form, and review list for a listing.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Reusable interactive star rating component supporting custom sizes and click handling.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty placeholder component file for testimonial bubbles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and mutate backend data such as user profiles, listings, reviews, events, and admin operations via an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet configuring Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH-based theme variables, fonts, and animation keyframes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that initializes React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Renders the About Us page with styled sections describing STYO, its registration details, and leadership team.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard with identity checks, data fetching hooks, notification handling, quick publish, and UI for managing users, listings, and city charges.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled booking policy page with scrollable sections outlining terms, cancellation rules, and payment details.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Displays a grid of accommodation categories with images and animations, allowing navigation to filtered listings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring animated category cards, lazy‑loaded sections, and navigation to listings and other site features.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Lists accommodations with category filtering, lazy‑loaded cards and map, and synced URL search parameters.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user profile with identity checks, form fields, save logic, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Page for owners to create, edit, and manage their property listings with form handling, dialogs, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Public-facing form allowing anyone to submit a property listing with validation, image uploads, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays locked property details and handles unlocking owner contact info, including download, call, and WhatsApp actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, shadows, plugins, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Defines project state for adding a new PropertyStatus enum and integrating it into backend listings and frontend UI. Includes existing features, new feature requests, and architectural notes guiding the status model and display updates.
